District 6
==========

![Councilmember Brandon Murden profile photo](https://www.cityofmesquite.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=29748 "Councilmember Brandon Murden profile photo")





1. **Brandon Murden**
   **Councilmember, District 6**

   Current Term Expires: November 2027
   [Email District 6](mailto:district6@cityofmesquite.com)

   Ph: 469-783-5183

   **Mailing Address**

   City of Mesquite
   P.O. Box 850137
   Mesquite, TX 75185-0137

About Brandon Murden
====================

* Mesquite resident since 2009
* Children: Sariah, Skylar and Summer

City of Mesquite
----------------

* Texas Senate Delegate, District 16 Precinct Chair
* Prince Hall Freemason
